page.title: 03 SHOPPING
page.content:
Everyone uses the{village shop,}just over half the families go there often, the rest occasionally. Only six families do their main shopping for food there however.
The{village shop}sells all kinds of things from B.M.X. bikes to foot stools, from toys to one pence chews. Although it sells all these things, it is only a small room with another as a stock room. It does not sell clothes.
The main food shopping places are {Ashbourne}closely followed by{Derby and{Belper.}Some families also use{ {Matlock }and{Wirksworth. { Almost everybody goes to{Derby}to buy their clothes. Clothes shops in{Belper {Ashbourne, Matlock}and{Wirksworth}are used by two or three families.
